Feb. 27, 2011 D Scottish Championship (Championship Section)
Scottish Championship (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Scotland
Championship
Paganini Variations
Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Qualifiers: Exchange Communications Whitburn and Co-operative Funeralcare
Terris Medal (best cornet): Chris Bradley (Whitburn) John Campbell Award (best trombone): Luke Williams (Kirkintilloch) Bram Thomson Medal (best horn/flugel): Karen Brow (flugel horn, Lochgelly) James MacMillan Medal (best baritone/euphonium): Glenn Van Looy (euphonium, Lochgelly) James Hillis Memorial Trophy (best basses): Lochgelly
Stan Lippeatt replaced David Read (who was ill)
Sept. 9, 2010, 2:20 p.m. Nov. 6, 2011, 1:54 p.m.
